attributes.additional_details:
The Woodthorpe Village Community Group would ask that the Government pursue the development of 'Brown' sites to build whole new towns with their own facilities, infrastructure and road links instead of relaxing National Planning Policies, and against Local Planning Policies, approve significant housing developments on 'Green' sites where the existing towns and villages will have their social, ecological, environmental and community identities destroyed.

Please sign this petition and stop our towns, villages and countryside being spoilt for ever.
